101001010.name: Son Goku (Kid)
101001010.title: Turtle Style
101001010.leader-skill: Boost the Attack of Strength units by an Extreme amount
passive-skill: Boost damage dealt to enemies with the Hand to hand combat characteristic
Boost the chance of Critical Hits for Agile allies by a Medium amount
When HP is below 50%, this unit counters every normal attack

ultimate.skill-description: Boost the Damage Dealt to enemies with the Monster characteristic by an Extreme amount for 2 turns, inflict 710% dmg to target enemy

skill-1.skill-description: Inflict 150% damage to the enemy main team

skill-2.skill-description: Boost the Attack of this unit by an Extreme amount for 4 turns, remove one stat reducing debuff from this unit

skill-3.skill-name: The Power of Master Roshi's Teachings
skill-3.skill-description: Reduce the Defence of enemies from Dragon Ball by an Extreme amount for 4 turns, inflict 210% damage to the target

101001040.name: Son Goku (Adult)
101001040.title: The Saiyan Raised on Earth
101001040.leader-skill: Boost the Attack of Strength and Heart units by a Large amount
passive-skill: Boost the Attack of Main Team Allies by a Large amount
Boost Defence by a Large amount against enemies with the Hand to Hand Combat characteristic
All Main Team Allies will ignore the first hit of damage at the beginning of the fight

ultimate.skill-description: Inflict 300% damage to the Target Enemy and a further 300% to the whole enemy Main Team

skill-1.skill-description: Inflict 150% damage to all enemy Main Team, reduce target Defence by a large amount for 4 turns

skill-2.skill-description: Inflict 400% damage to the Target Enemy and roll back their skill gauge by 20%

skill-3.skill-description: Inflict 300% damage to all Enemy Supports

skill-1.skill-description: Inflict 150% damage to all enemy Main Team, reduce target Defence by a large amount for 4 turns

skill-2.skill-description: Inflict 400% damage to the Target Enemy and roll back their skill gauge by 20%

skill-3.skill-description: Inflict 300% damage to all Enemy Supports

skill-4.skill-description: Increase the Speed and chance of Critical Hits for this unit by an Extreme amount for 4 turns, additionally, increase this units number of normal attacks by +1 for 3 turns

passive-skill: Boost Speed by a Medium amount
Boost the Speed of Technique allies by a Medium amount
Remove weakness debuffs from this unit twice

ultimate.skill-description: Inflict 400% damage to the target and roll back their cooldowns by 10%, furthermore, inflict 400% damage to support slot enemies

skill-2.skill-description: Reduce the Attack of main team enemies by a Medium amount for 4 turns and chance to Blind them for 4 turns

skill-3.skill-description: Negate all positive buffs on the enemy main team

skill-2.skill-description: Increase own crit rate by an extreme amount for 4 turns, adds +1 to normal attack for 4 turns

skill-3.skill-description: 230% dmg to target enemy, blocks damage twice

passive-skill: Prevent Ultimate Attack Seal on this unit once from the start of battle

When this unit's HP is 50% or more, boost his Ultimate Attack Damage by a Large amount

skill-1.skill-description: Inflict 300% damage to the target and reduce their Ultimate Attack Damage by a Large amount for 2 turns

skill-2.skill-description: Recover this unit's HP my a Medium amount

skill-3.skill-description: Roll back the cooldowns of random enemy supports by 5%, furthermore inflict 100% damage to the target
